##Code Book
This creates a tidy dataset with the follwing variables

- activity: WALKING, WALKING_UPSTAIRS, WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS, SITTING, STANDING, LAYING
- subject: integers 1:20
- value: value of the measure
- signal: freq, time
- action: BodyAcc,BodyAccJerk,BodyAccJerkMag,BodyAccMag,BodyBodyAccJerkMag, BodyBodyGyroJerkMag, BodyGyro, BodyBodyGyroMag, BodyGyroJerk, BodyGyroJerkMag, BodyGyroMag, GravityAcc, GravityAccMag
- measure: mean(), meanFreq(), std()
- coordinate: X, Y, ""
